forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog after midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the sun pours down softly, casting a warm glow upon the iconic skyline and the bustling streets below. The air is alive with a fresh breeze, swirling gently from the west, at times gusting with a spirited confidence. As the temperature hovers just above the comfortable mark of 70, you’ll find respite from the sun’s ardor in the shade of a welcoming tree or a charming café awning. The day promises an intriguing transformation as it leads into evening, inviting areas of fog to weave their way through the city after midnight, imparting a refreshing layer of mystique.

As twilight approaches, temperatures will cool to a mild 56, urging a light sweater or a cozy jacket into your evening plans. The gentle dance of clouds might coax you into a quiet corner of your favorite local bistro or a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where the canopy of fog can blanket you in a serene hush. Whether you're seeking the camaraderie of friends or the solace of your own thoughts, this evening yields a delightful spectrum of opportunities to appreciate the character of a city caught between the embrace of sun and fog.
